page.title: 20EAST PRESTON SUMMER 1985
page.content:
East Preston Schools' Fete cont. display of country dancing by the children of the Junior School. Amongst the attractions there were raffles, sideshows and various stalls. It was a very enjoyable afternoon. { {STOP PRESS Vandals once again broke into the school. They caused considerable damage to the changing -rooms and threw assorted rubbish into the pool. What saddened us most of all was that two gerbils, two hamsters and three fish were killed and thrown in the pool.
{DOMESDAY PROJECT Information collected and collated by pupils and staff of East Preston County Junior School in the summer term of 1985.
